Address.label: Address
Address.value: 7909 PARKWOOD CIRCLE DRIVE, HOUSTON, Texas, 77036-6565, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: NOV (formerly National Oilwell Varco) is a leading supplier of oil and gas drilling rig equipment and products, such as downhole tools, drill pipe, and well casing. The company operates on a global scale, with more than a thousand locations on six continents.
